website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality whisk that costs a little bit more than others, but performs well in the kitchen.
pros: Nice length, but narrow enough to work well in a small bowl
Grip is solid and comfortable in the hand
cons: This whisk has lots of wires and can be difficult to clean if you do not rinse it quickly

customer_reviews.title: These are the best whisks to own
customer_reviews.text: These are the best whisks to own. I had several different ones from various brands (including Martha Stewart brand) and after gong through the dishwasher they would collect water in the handle... coming in from where the whisk meets the handle. So the next time using the whisk (even days later), old water would drip down the whisk into the food you were making. This is the only whisk I have found that doesn't have that problem. I ended up replacing all my other whisks with these ones.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Screams Quality xoxo
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing whisk. My old whisk's handle broke so I ended up buying this one and immediately, I can feel the difference in quality vs my old whisk. This wires on this thing is made of stainless steel and feels super sturdy. My old, cheap whisk had wires tangling all up on each other like two love struck teenagers unlike this whisk. In addition, the grip is comfortable to hold and prevents slippage while you whisk. I've been using it to beat eggs, flours, etc. without a problem at all. Highly recommended! Thanks OXO. xoxoxo Easy to clean 5/5 ***** Easy to hold 5/5 ***** Sturdiness 5/5 ***** My recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 whisks. One broke in half, the other keeps falling out of the bowl/pot. I was fed up and purchased this whisk. This is a quality whisk. Its evenly balanced, has a good grip, and has a good weight. I no longer have to deal with my whisk constantly falking over. It's easy to wash too.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Another OXO Wonderful Tool
customer_reviews.text: Did my research from The Sweet Home, America's Test Kitchen, and decided that this was the best universal whisk for just about anything that you would need in your kitchen before getting out the beaters. Of course OXO is the top line when it comes to utensils in the kitchen. And I love the way that this whisk is perfect to get down into a deep KitchenAid mixing bowl or easy enough to use on a small skillet when you are making a reduction sauce. Love how there is a whisk inside a whisk that allows for perfect distribution of ingredients. Nice handle, and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable whisk, very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it’s a whisk, I don’t have too much to say, but I do love that when you wash the whisk, there aren’t any openings for water to collect and not dry. I’ve had random, cheap whisks where the wire in the whisk connects to the handle through openings that allow water to come in, only for it to not dry fully before I use it. Which means I would randomly sprinkle water into a bowl of dry ingredients while mixing, which became very annoying. It’s also easy to store, since the wire is flexible without being too bendy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Schrans

customer_reviews.title: Best whisk!
customer_reviews.text: Vary comfortable to hold and use I ordered the 11 inch balloon better whisk fits good in my vollrath 5 qt mixing bowl
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: HIGH TECH HAND HELD SIMPLICITY
customer_reviews.text: With the whisk components being positively set in the handle and what I believe to be a perfect balance of whisk curvature and thickness, this "Good Grips" is one of the smarter kitchen devices I have found in some time. The handle has the benefit of being nicely shaped and sized to put a good spin on. Looks like the electric hand held mixer is going to be a space taker in one of the cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Wrench

customer_reviews.title: Made making hollaindaise sauce a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I am in culinary school and one of our finals was making sauces by hand. I was always breaking my hollandaise but this little gadget truly helped me make delicious hollandaise. No more broken hollandaise. It was so easy to hold and the bulb on the whisk is shapped just right that i was able to whisk with abandon and not get tired. All my sauces turned out great and I got an A* on the exam. Thank you OXO.
customer_reviews.author: Laine R.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Whisks are all a bit of a pain to clean and this is no different. I really like how all of the wires are without joints. The handle is easy to hold onto and there are enough wires to whip up all kinds of things. Would buy again if it ever breaks.
customer_reviews.author: always curious

customer_reviews.title: Will whisk you off your feet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought far too many whisks in the past few years. I kept trying to get my wife colorful ones (the wires came out very quickly) or fancy ones (the balls fell off) and even though they were rated high they all sucked. This whisk knows no suck, only whisk. It is sturdy, easy to clean, and easy to hold. And it's only $10. Colorful -  Fancy -
customer_reviews.author: pencek

customer_reviews.title: Sick of broken whisks
customer_reviews.text: Every time I bake at my mom's house the only available whisk was this broken one that looked horrible and barely functioned. This was a small mother's day gift for her but boy was she excited about it! Finally a sturdy good quality whisk for her to bake or for both of us when we spend quality time together <3
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It feels extremely cheap. The whisk end is very flimsy and not as stiff as I would have liked. Nothing special in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: My Cuisinart Broke - This was its replacement
customer_reviews.text: When my old whisk broke while making ice cream base, I was desperate for a sturdy whisk that could handle my cooking. When this came, I was pleasantly surprised and found it easy to hold, nicely weighted and a great value. I look forward to adding this to my cooking needs. RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy durable
customer_reviews.text: I had a kitchen aid wisk that I LOVED, but when it broke I decided to try this one because I love all of their products (so far, anyway). I am glad I did, this one is great! Love the handle and the width of the wisks (fits better in the drawer)
customer_reviews.author: SmittyE

customer_reviews.title: BEST grip whisk
customer_reviews.text: OXO is the best company I've found for their handles/grips on items and this has been great just as the other items I've purchased. I have hand/grip problems and after finding OXO I'm always looking for new items to help make my life easier, highly recommend them for this reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: standard whip works well
customer_reviews.text: it's a whip! it works well and has not shown any signs of rust around the base or the tines. i used to go through a few dollar store whips every year because they would rust so quickly. i decided to try this one since it appears to be of good quality at a reasonable price. it was also recommended by seriouseats but i assume that was a paid ad. either way it is living up to my expectations for now. i would buy this again but hopefully it will last several years before wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: King Drin

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk! Feels solid and comfortable in hand
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk! Feels solid and comfortable in hand. Many balloon whisks are so flimsy that the wires shift and no longer hold their shape, rendering them virtually useless for incorporating air into stuff. So far, the OXO whisk is holding its shape and doing its job perfectly. Its size is perfect for my small hands.
customer_reviews.author: anniekatz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for regular use
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy strong whisk, the other whisk I had before could not withstand our regular use and broke almost immediately. Easy to hold and does not slip in your hands. Easy to hand wash. I have not tried the dishwasher because I've found many products say they are dishwasher safe and are not so best not to risk it with this one in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Elsbeth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, doesn't rust, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy whisk! I don't think I'll ever have to buy another one again. The ones I purchased before were always flimsy and got rust in between the handle and bristles. I've been using this whisk for almost a year now and absolutely no rust. It is easy to hand-wash, and also washes well in the dishwasher. It's very strong so it doesn't take as much effort or arm power to whisk up my dishes. It's definitely worth the extra few bucks to get this strong, sturdy whisk instead of constantly replacing cheap ones and worrying about rust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip and well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Both this whisk and the other size I bought are easy to grip while mixing. I use the larger in bigger bowls and the smaller one is perfect for smaller quantity mixing. Since they are stainless steel, I won't worry about them corroding or rusting like my old one did. They clean up easily, even in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Handywoman Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true usually beats the new
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of OXO products. However, I recently realized that my nylon whisk was not cutting it. Yes it was great for my nonstick pans, but sometimes you need old fashion technology. Now that I have a nylon and wire whisk, I have options. I usually turn to this whisk first, because the handle is a good fit in my hand, and the wire is strong and stiff, giving me lots of air in whatever I am whisking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made wisk and works fine. So they ask if it’s easy to clean, well as you would expect when winking things up some eggs or food get on all the wires so it takes a bit to get it clean- but that would happen with any whisk. So- if you need a whisk and don’t want to overpay, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to handle big jobs like a dozen eggs or a lot of batter
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Bought this after I had a silicone one that fell apart, live this one way more. Large enough to handle big jobs like a dozen eggs or a lot of batter, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sydbey

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: The handle on this is great, its a nice rubber that has a great grip to it. The actual whisk is also good, its just a normal whisk. This is the best whisk I have seen on amazon, so I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Poizoni

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing is great!! I have upgrading all of my kitchen utensils from my cheap crap to things that will last a very long time. This is really easy to clean, extremely sturdy and has some weight to it so if you rest in a smaller bowl it doesn’t just flip out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Whitecotton

customer_reviews.title: Great Beater
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed beater. Wires are not too thin nor too thick, the handle both feels nice and has a good shape. Unless you have a very specific need (like very thin or very thick wires), or unless you have very large hands, this should be a fantastic beater.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's designed for 👍
customer_reviews.text: My old stainless steel whisk started to rust, so after countless hours of searching for a quality replacement, I chose the OXO 'Good Grips' 11-Inch Better Balloon Whisk. I was intrigued with the ball type whisk design, but too many reviewers mentioned that the balls were coming off. I like the soft grip of the OXO and that it's dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Allworkandnoplay

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I broke my mom’s old whisk making muffins with pumpkin (resulting in a really thick batter) - it snapped right in half. I made the same recipe using this whisk and it powered through. Seems sturdy and like it’ll last a long time. Comfortable to handle, too!
customer_reviews.author: Aprilcot

customer_reviews.title: Sure to whisk you off your feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality whisk. Cleans easily and handle is comfy. Would love it if they made a slightly longer version as we use it often to mix a gallon jug of lemonade and it’s just barely long enough. Happy with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mom o' Twin Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Basic
customer_reviews.text: I have two whisks, this one, and a silicone covered whisk. This whisk is great to mix things quickly by hand. The metal wires instead of the silicone just works better. I use the silicone whisk for like making white cheese sauce or pudding (because of the scrapping the bottom of the pan in high heat). But the metal is a powerhouse of whisk energy. Eggs are fluffier than silicone, working with quiches or even whip cream because the wire as stronger withstand force and are thinner. Purchased another one for a housewarming gift for a friend. When I realized they cook and didn't have a whisk, boy they are missing out.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Roboto

customer_reviews.title: Whisk for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said the only thing he wanted for University graduation was things for his kitchen because he wants to learn to cook. He moved 1/2 way across the states to begin his new life with a job and place to stay to try developing his kitchen skills. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Aldena

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-built whisk that I use often and I expect will last quite a long time. It's nice and flexible instead of being too stiff, making it quite versatile. It's as easy to clean as any other whisk I've had.
customer_reviews.author: ScottA

customer_reviews.title: Nice whisk, good handle, resin sealed.
customer_reviews.text: This whisk is awesome. The resin at the bottom of the wires prevents any water intrusion into the handle like other whisks. The handle is a great shape and the non slip is nice. The whisk even has a good weight and feel to it. The whisk itself is durable and I know many people that regard this as the best whisk, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jdub

customer_reviews.title: Great Whisk - Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice whisk - gets the job done. My last whisk (Kitchen Aid) broke in half, with minimal use. This whisk has shown to be superior, and features a more ergonomic handle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Handle
customer_reviews.text: I love Oxo kitchen utensils, and this whisk is no exception. Great handle....'skinny'-handles whisks just don't work for me. Good rubberized grip and fits comfortably in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this whisk. Is so comfortable to use and it seems to make mixing everything so much easier and faster. I’ll be recommending this to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Privette

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple months until the handle fell off. The handle can just be put back, but now it fills with water anytime you wash it. This water, of questionable cleanliness, falls into your food when the handle comes off which is frequent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Could not use to make whipped potatos
customer_reviews.text: Because of the double loops of wire on this item I was not able to use it to whip potatoes into mashed potatoes. The potatoes stuck in the wire. I threw it away then bought a cheaper one and it worked better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fugett

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but a little bigger than I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.text: Whisk is great and does it's job, however for what I need it for I feel like it is a bit to big, I wish it was a little smaller, but other than that it works great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brie Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Durable Quality Whisk
customer_reviews.text: Its comfortable to hold as easy to clean and a whisk can be and does a great job whisking. Don't know what else you could ask for in a whisk. Its just a simple quality kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: To clean the whisk, I just soak it in warm soapy water. Then I let it towel dry. The handle is rubber, easy to hold unto. I usually love OXO untensils, and this one didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Whisked Away
customer_reviews.text: When they say 11 inches they mean 11 inches from bottom of handle to tip. I have never owned any good whisks and have always used those ones you get in the "bargain" section at most department stores or mass merchandisers. I am not sure if the OXO brand is the best whisk you can get, but judging by the one I got, I would say it is definitely a brand well worth considering. The wires are not extremely rigid like the cheapies, but they don't feel like they are going to bend either. They have just the right amount of give to make whisking together ingredients a snap. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RDSWY4

customer_reviews.title: Best Whisk
customer_reviews.text: This is the sturdiest whisk I’ve ever owned. I’m so glad I purchased this one. I had another brand’s silicone whisk & it was horrible. This whisk blends very well.
customer_reviews.author: April Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, gets rust
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the whisk. However, the handle does have multiple parts that will trap moisture after being in the dishwasher. It tends to collect rust.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Product seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well made. I was making some candy that hardened on the wires and was wondering if it would be a pain to get them off. It wasn’t! I was able to flexibly move the wires and it didn’t seem like the product would fall apart. It also seemed lighter on the hand than traditional metal handles. That being said, I’ve only used this twice so I can’t say much about durability and/or longevity, but I’ve been pleased with the times I’ve used it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Li

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of most OXO Good Grips products and this whisk is no exception. The biggest problem I have with many whisks is the handle traps water and leaks when you try to use it. The only remedy for a leaky handle is to take it apart and dry it or use the whisk with a paper towel wrapped around the handle. It's pretty inconvenient either way. The OXO whisk doesn't trap water or leak which makes it worth recommending
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless steel product.
customer_reviews.text: I like something that holds up when I use it constantly in the kitchen. This product it great. I look forward to using it for many years. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip, size and sturdiness. Washing it is a hassle, recommend washing it as soon as you’re done using it. It is a little tough to get the inner part.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whisk
customer_reviews.text: This whisk's handle is well balanced and shaped nicely to reduce hand fatigue. The silicone handle is also heat resistant which is really nice when making things like pastry cream and hot cereals. The bulb whisks evenly - I've had no issues with clumping or missing the edges of bowls or pans. Overall, a very nice whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because those we have from Walmart just don't last without rusting or something. My husband cooks outside on the Griddle and he loves it for mixing his concoctions. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gale

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and I've used it a few times so far. Its alot stronger than my previous one and cleans very well. I will update you if anything negative happens.
customer_reviews.author: Coolestmomuknow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I was using a silicone multi-colored one (a popular one) and it was not working well for me. I also had a smaller one that was beginning to rust. I threw them both away when this one arrived. I'll stick with this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: ccgirl

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $1 whisk before upgrading to this whisk and what a DIFFERENCE! Before even using it, you can already tell the quality on your hands. For the first time using it, I made some brownies and the bather was very thick. But this whisk didn't flex a muscle! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Best whisk
customer_reviews.text: As whisks go, this is probably the best you can get. Very sturdy and the wires keep their shape. It is my go to whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Whisk well, whisk wise.
customer_reviews.text: I read a review of different whisks and this got very high marks. We needed one so, decided to try it out. Well, it whisks well indeed. In fact, we used this to make up a rue for our gumbo and it worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Scott_H

customer_reviews.title: OXO quality
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I need something for the kitchen, if I find an OXO version this is what I purchase. Very good products.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Needed something perfect to beat things up
customer_reviews.text: I'm very...particular about what and how I beat things. This was perfect. Good hand feel, easy cleanup. What more can you ask.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Wright

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Have seen many reviews online, on TV cooking shows, and here. Was needing a bigger whisk - I have the smaller OXO that I use all the time for smaller jobs, marinade mixing, quick sauces, etc. This is a bigger version and is PERFECT. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Holladay

customer_reviews.title: Quality Whisk
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much trouble finding a good quality whisk that can make it in the dishwasher. This is by far the best one I have ever used. It was made with quality material and I dont see it getting destroyed as easily as the other ones I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa kissable kay

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good whisk but actually quite heavy. If you don't work out you may have some extra trouble beating ingredients for a prolonged period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less work
customer_reviews.text: Feels well made and it gets my eggs whisked faster than my old one. I expect it’s because there are more tines/wires. Less work for me is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: WeeLittleSoul

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Easy grip handle and comfortable to hold. Really like the way it is made as it gets the job done with less effort. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: My favorite whisk
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful whisk. It has plenty of wires, is very solid, great feel, great size, easy to clean. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can never have enough whisks!
customer_reviews.text: Never met an OXO Good Grip I didn't love. I also have the smaller one and various other OXO products. Good quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T. Katt

customer_reviews.title: Works as needed
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as we need it to. My husband uses it to make his weekend pancakes. No complaints from him.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, sturdy and the hand grip is perfect for me because I have arthritis in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OXO products are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent OXO product. Works well in high heat (I use it to mix soaps and candles). Cleans up pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emme D.

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk!
customer_reviews.text: We previously owned this brand of whisk and decided to repurchase this same brand from Amazon because the whisk was the best price here compared to other stores. This whisk seems to be sturdier than the previous one we had and the metal is holding its shape well.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: It does the job...
customer_reviews.text: OXO makes great products! This whisk is comfortable and easy to use. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MISS PRINGLE

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy handle. I don’t like cleaning these things so I didn’t rate that factor, they’re all a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: superb.
customer_reviews.text: strong, sturdy, easy to clean, easy to use, fits hand perfect. This is the ultimate whisk. Never thought I'd say that.
customer_reviews.author: Orion2012

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sturdy whisk. Used a few times and still holding up without deforming.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: We eat pancakes weekly, so a good whisk is a must for our family. We’ve had this one for about 3 months and it’s held up great so far! It feels sturdy and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Solid, and is weighted so it stays put when you leave it in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I already had the smaller version so I knew what I was getting with the bigger one. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ali K

customer_reviews.title: I loved the high quality of handle and wires
customer_reviews.text: This is the best whisk I’ve ever had. The wires are sturdy and the handle comfortable to use, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a sturdy tool to use for scrambling eggs, batter, and etc. can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent the extra money and upgraded to this a long time ago. It has not gotten any water in the base from washing it in the dishwasher. love it!
customer_reviews.author: FLAgatorfan15

customer_reviews.title: A Balloon Whisk???
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this works or what it might be used for. However when my wife asks for a whisk I'm on it. The great thing is that OXO is one of the safest picks when dealing with kitchen items. My wife loves everything about this whisk from the weight and balance to the feel of the grip in her hand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: You must have this Whisk!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this balloon whisk. She said so far this is one of the best whisks we had.
customer_reviews.author: Bluezuma

customer_reviews.title: Nice whisk
customer_reviews.text: The quality is better than my other whisk that had a plastic ring that was painted silver to hold the wires together. This whisk has a stainless steel ring and is lightweight but a generous size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Keep going back to OXO for their quality
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk. Bought it before I started culinary school. Three years later, more than a few uses it stills feel new and sturdy. A quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Very good whisk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy whisk, and should last a very long time. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says it is. Great whisk for a good price. Love the handle and all the wires. Makes whisking egg whites faster and the larger handle cuts down on hand cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Whisks it! Whisks it good!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely whisk, whisks like a whisk should! No rust, easy to use, easy to clean. Every whisker-lovers dream.
customer_reviews.author: Hebbas

customer_reviews.title: Love all OXO products!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality whisk. Works well, the handle is just the right size, and it cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang For Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Though the price might make you think that it is a cheaply made item, it is not! It is well constructed and if maintained with reasonable care it will last a long time. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: john pratt

customer_reviews.title: Well made, a little too big for small bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grip, wires stand up to washing, they don't warp. Mixes well, but too big for mixing in a small bowl or small quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Nice whisk
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge improvement over my old whisk. It whips up and froths scrambled eggs or whatever else you’re mixing quickly. I wouldn’t use it on anything too thick, like some pancake batters.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to do heavy mixing
customer_reviews.text: Love this whisk for thick products. Mixes perfectly and does not flex or bend like my others.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality comfortable handle whisk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable whisk to use and the handle fits my hand perfectly. It does what it is intended to do and is easy to clean. The handle is thick enough to allow a useful grip for stirring or whisking.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Best Whisk
customer_reviews.text: Don't compromise on your kitchen products. This whisk is solid and well built and has whipped many eggs, cornbread mixes and cake mixes with the greatest of ease.
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Good whisk
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy whisk. All the loops don't touch, so its not real effective for aerating (my old one did a great job of incorporating all materials). Beside that, its a sturdy whisk that hopefully will last a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in a whisk. Stainless, Sturdy, dishwasher safe and a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Swanlake

customer_reviews.title: Good whisk!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, nice weight. Glad I got this size instead of the smaller 9” version. This one still works for most smaller jobs. If I were to get a smaller one I’d get one much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is more compact than others that I have had in the past. It takes up less space in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: As always, OXO delivers with this whisk. Sturdy, comfortable handle, great quality. No regrets. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Z

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk! I ordered the silicone one too for my non-stick pans. What more can I say about it?
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The handle is comfortable. The wires are just the right amount of flexible and it rinses easily. Good size for larger batches.
customer_reviews.author: dorotea

customer_reviews.title: Only whisk I need
customer_reviews.text: Can't live with out this. Emulifies salad dressings in a flash. Scrambles eggs just as easily. Simple to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Briana D. Wagner

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips 11-Inch Better Balloon Whisk
product_meta.description:
Size:11-InchOur Good Grips Whisks feature polished stainless steel wires and teardrop shaped handles that fit comfortably in the palm of your hand. The soft handle won't slip out of your hand, even when wet. Beat eggs, stir batter, whip cream and stir sauces in comfort. Available in 9-inch , 11-inch , 11-inch Balloon and Flat versions.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Polished stainless steel wires and narrow shape are perfect for whisking in a small bowl or container
Innovative handle shape and soft, comfortable grip to absorb pressure
